Fix Dockerfile.diarization module import error - vtt_transcribe not found after layer reordering
description: After reordering Dockerfile.diarization to optimize layer caching (copying source before uv pip install), Docker build uses cached layers but vtt_transcribe module not found at runtime. Error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'vtt_transcribe'. Dockerfile (base) works fine with same pattern. Need to rebuild with --no-cache or fix layer ordering.

Add stdin/stdout support for Docker containerized usage
description: Enable Docker usage without volume mounts by reading input from stdin and writing output to stdout. Simplifies Docker UX to: cat file | docker run -i vtt:latest --diarize

title: Write failing tests for stdin detection and temp file handling
notes:
## COMPLETED (2026-02-04)

**Branch**: feature/T075.7-stdin-support-work
**PR #186**: https://github.com/JLCodeSource/vtt-transcribe/pull/186 (merged to feature/T075-docker-cd)

### Tests Written & Passing
- Unit tests for stdin detection in test_stdin_mode.py
- Test isolation fixed with autouse fixture mock_stdin_tty
- 247 tests passing, 6 skipped, 97% coverage

### BATS Smoke Tests Created
- tests/smoke/stdin.bats with 7 comprehensive tests:
  - uv run transcription from stdin
  - Installed package transcription from stdin  
  - Docker stdin mode with env var
  - Docker output redirection
  - Incompatible flag validation (-s, -o)
  - Diarization flag acceptance

### Documentation
- CLI help updated with stdin mode examples
- tests/smoke/README.md created for BATS test usage
- docker-build-test.yml workflow enhanced with stdin tests

### Performance
- Dockerfile optimized for layer caching (170s â†’ 1s for code changes)
- .dockerignore enhanced to reduce context

### Next Steps
Complete remaining T075.7 subtasks (7.2-7.11)
close_reason: Tests written and passing. BATS smoke tests created. All work merged to feature/T075-docker-cd via PR #186.

title: Add HuggingFace model access documentation to README
description: Users need to sign up for access to 4 HuggingFace models used by diarization: pyannote/segmentation-3.0, pyannote/speaker-diarization-3.1, pyannote/speaker-diarization-community-1, pyannote/wespeaker-voxceleb-resnet34-LM. Add section to README explaining how to request access and accept model terms.

title: Add unit tests for stdin auto-enable --no-review-speakers
description: Add unit tests to verify that args.no_review_speakers is automatically set to True when stdin_mode and args.diarize are both True. Current coverage shows lines 95-96 (the auto-enable logic) are not covered by unit tests.

title: Fix test isolation: mock sys.stdin.isatty() to prevent false stdin mode activation
description: After implementing stdin mode detection in main(), 31 existing tests fail because they don't mock sys.stdin.isatty(). This causes stdin mode to activate unexpectedly in test environments. Fix: Add patch('sys.stdin') with isatty.return_value=True to all affected tests in test_cli.py, test_handlers.py, test_main.py, test_diarization.py, test_transcriber.py
notes:
## COMPLETED (2026-02-04)

**Fixed via PR #186**: https://github.com/JLCodeSource/vtt-transcribe/pull/186

### Solution
Added autouse fixture `mock_stdin_tty` in conftest.py that mocks sys.stdin.isatty() to return True by default for all tests. This prevents stdin mode from activating in tests unless explicitly mocked otherwise.

### Implementation
- conftest.py: Added @pytest.fixture(autouse=True) mock_stdin_tty
- Fixed 31 failing tests across test_cli.py, test_handlers.py, test_main.py, test_diarization.py, test_transcriber.py
- All tests passing: 247 passed, 6 skipped, 97% coverage maintained

### Additional Work (Session)
- Created BATS smoke tests for stdin mode (tests/smoke/stdin.bats)
- Updated CLI help with stdin mode documentation
- Fixed BATS environment variable issues
- Optimized Dockerfile for faster rebuilds (170s â†’ 1s)
- All commits on feature/T075.7-stdin-support-work branch

### Status
PR #186 merged into feature/T075-docker-cd. Ready to close issue.
close_reason: Fixed via PR #186. Autouse fixture added to conftest.py prevents stdin mode activation in tests.
